trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Fort Myers
There were no other sightings in Fort Myers on or around April 12th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son Shane saw 2 aliens from his bedroom window. a grey and a reptililian. It was hard to believe him but he was so sincere. He saw them several times thru the month of april and May. I got nervous about it and kept door locked etc. about 1 am an the 16 of May I checked the back door, it was not locked and opened when i checked it. In the morning this foot print was out side the back door. I must have startled it as you can see dirt flew up as it moved quickly to its left. It had rained we had had a drought and it left it's print.I am going to try and send photos. It may not work. If not I will send to mufon, or you can get them from Mary Margaret Zimmer, I was able to mail some to her as I had her e mail address. her e mail is mm@skyscan She can foward pics of the foot print to you . I also have a plaster of paris cast.BIG claws. a foot like a chicken 3 claws in front one in back, or like an eagle, but it has a foot shape too behind the back claw with a heel. Notice the dirt it threw up to the side as it lept sideways.Also it has jumped up on our roof 3x once we heard it. 3 prints are in the front where it just jumped right up. Sincerly Mike
